response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exceptional opportunity to acquire our premium product. This item holds immense value for us, but considering its significance to you, we believe it's time to share this treasure. We propose to sell the product to you at a price of $1,200,000. This figure encapsulates not only the cost of production and market valuation but also reflects the unique opportunity for you to own something truly extraordinary. We understand the importance of this decision and assure you that by accepting this offer, you are securing a valuable asset that aligns perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of making this transaction and hope to welcome you as a valued member of our community.", "product_price": 1200000}
